channel.title: CVE Feed for Avaya -- Session Border Controller for Enterprise
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Avaya -- Session Border Controller for Enterprise

item.title: CVE-2020-7034|2024-08-04T09:18:02.940Z -- avaya -- session%20border%20controller%20for%20enterprise
item.description: A command injection vulnerability in Avaya Session Border Controller for Enterprise could allow an authenticated, remote attacker to send specially crafted messages and execute arbitrary commands with the affected system privileges. Affected versions of Avaya Session Border Controller for Enterprise include 7.x, 8.0 through 8.1.1.x
